posts.post_content:
As part of an auction that I posted to ebay earlier tonight, a really nice example of a 1914, B18 felt blanket was included. 

Along with the card is also a very early Rawlings "Koney" model basemitt and a T206 Konetchy card with Piedmont back...an instant Konetchy collection!

Please take a look if interested...I am always happy to re-work the listing and help out a fellow board member...

[url]https://www.ebay.com/itm/Rawlings-Koney-model-basemitt-with-1909-T206-Card-and-B18-Blanket-RARE/263333891827[/url]  

Thanks,
Jon 
[url]www.dugouttreasures.com[/url]
